attributes.review: I have the Iphone xs. I AM ONE PHONE BEHIND, ONE. However this app is super glitchy and laggy. I downloaded it to see why everyone hated it. now i know. I couldn’t even get myself to get past the opening page. VERY UGLY
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: When I opened the app my dolls started dancing, worst experience. They started cooking my dog but for some reason he lived. Our hours is destroyed, and now there’s Penguins living in our backyard.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: Awful. Literal crap. Didn’t work, very slow and glitchy. Contained awful and horrific images that made me feel sick to my stomach of a VERY gross orange man. I didn’t feel comfortable on the app. I’m disgusted.
attributes.title: Genuine Review

attributes.review: I opened it and was immediately shown propaganda. The pop up ads are disgusting and never ending. I don’t know how this man can have such a bad app. Flappy bird had better developers.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app and saw the spray tanned cheeto, my phone screen actually ended up cracking and now I have shards of glass everywhere because of the stupid cheeto man
attributes.title: My phone screen cracked

attributes.review: I was here to support my president Trump but when I opened the app a pig was being forced to say ignorant stuff. Like how is this allowed. The poor piggy must be traumatized after all that stuff.
attributes.title: Possible animal abuse....

attributes.review: I downloaded it and trump came through the screen and stole everything. do not download unless your rating it one star 😌
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: this app keeps crashing my phone after the last 5 updates. May as well delete the app
attributes.title: NO NO NO

attributes.review: as soon as i download the app my fingers got cheto dust stains all over them and my air pods started mind controlling me😭if it wasn’t for my pet polar bear bringing me back to life i never would have made it back from wherever i was, so scary -10/10 wouldn’t recommend😭my pet whale also has ptsd from looking at my phone screen while this was on :( #justiceformywhale
horrible app. needs to be deleted from the app store ASAP. when i got on the app it constantly glitched. i will be deleting this right after my review ❤️
attributes.title: no 💕🧚🏻‍♀️✨
